1370: Karel was born in Waale straet in 1370.
Got married to Hildegardis at age 28 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Hildegardis, at age 28.
1388: Lost his wife Hildegardis while she was giving birth to Godeweris in 1388.
1371: Had a son with Hildegardis, Herardus, at age 29.
1374: Had a son with Hildegardis, Gherelm, at age 32.
1375: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Sipper, at age 33.
1378: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Aleydis, at age 36.
1380: Had a son with Hildegardis, Ludolphus, at age 38.
